content:
@Grahame Grieve @Sean McIlvenna

Linda and I were looking at the cda-core-2.0 github repo and noticed that the FHIR Logical Model for CDA looks a lot like an IG. Is it possible for you to turn this information into an IG that we could review and read so we could better understand what's in it? And, understand how it compares to the information contained in the HL7 CDA R2.0 Specification.

this is how Grahame recommended to approach CDA design using FHIR tooling; build an IG that represents the core CDA logical model, then CDA IGs can reference it as a dependency and extend the models in cda-core-2.0 as profiles in the IG that depends on it.
